alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Richland; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:54PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wibaux, northeastern Dawson and southeastern Richland Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 154 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Intake, or 12 miles north of Glendive, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lambert, Savage, Intake, Enid, Stipek, Midway, Burns and Crane. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
